modName: Vladxn's Various Little Mods - Skyrim - VVLMS
summary: VVLMS is a collection of small mods that I have created over time.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]About the file:[/size][/color][/font]
[/b][size=2]
"Vladxn's Various Little Mods - Skyrim - SVVLM" is a collection of old, small mods that I have created over time, mostly for myself only.
The file includes many .esp.[/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6]
[/color][/font][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#b6b6b6][b]Mods Included:[/b][/color][/font]
[/size]
I will add other mods to the collection. Right now, the file contains 5 mods :

[size=2]-A mod that redecorates Alva's house in Morthal and makes it your player home. Nothing fancy (ONLY INSTALL AFTER FINISHING "Laid To Rest")
-A mod that adds a pair of gauntlets called "The Crimson Gauntlets". They can be found in Dragonsreach on Farengar's table
-A mod that fixes the Cultist Armor from the Dragonborn DLC. Now the whole set is light and has slightly better stats.
-A mod that turns Movarth's Lair into a sanctuary. I use this mod together with Sokco's Guild Starter (ONLY INSTALL AFTER FINISHING "Laid To Rest")
-A mod that redecorates Farengar's place. It makes it more stylish[/size]

[size=3]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Georgia][b][i][size=5]By Vladxn[/size][/i][/b][/font][/size]
author: Vladxn
